title: Recovering Push Emails on Android
creator: francesco25
content: I installed Thunderbird on my Android phone. I'm a Thunderbird fan, so when I saw there was a mobile version, I immediately downloaded and installed it. Unfortunately, after a few days, I realized that the push retrieval of incoming emails doesn't work. This feature is essential for me because I need real-time notifications. Did I do something wrong, or are there general problems with this feature? My Android is a Xiaomi Redmi 9 Note Pro. For now, I'm forced to use the "Edison Software" app, where the push function works perfectly without having to configure anything.
